name: fastmcp
description: Use when working with FastMCP - Python framework for building MCP servers with GitHub insights
_comment: This config demonstrates three-stream GitHub architecture:

_streams.code: Deep C3.x analysis (20-60 min) - patterns, examples, guides, configs, architecture
_streams.docs: Repository documentation (1-2 min) - README, CONTRIBUTING, docs/*.md
_streams.insights: GitHub metadata (1-2 min) - issues, labels, stars, forks

github_integration.metadata: Shows stars, language, description in router SKILL.md
github_integration.readme_quickstart: Extracts first 500 chars of README as quick start
github_integration.common_issues: Lists top 5 GitHub issues in router
github_integration.issue_categorization: Matches issues to sub-skills by keywords
github_integration.label_weighting: GitHub labels weighted 2x in routing keywords
